callErstelleEintrag

public boolean callErstelleEintrag(java.lang.String title,

                                   java.lang.String host,
                                   int port)
                            throws org.apache.axis2.AxisFault,
                                   java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                   Exception,
                                   SQLException
This method will create a new article.

Parameters:
title - title of the article
content - content of the article
host - the serveradress
port - the serverport
Returns:
true if successful, else false
Throws:
org.apache.axis2.AxisFault - if an axisfault occurs
java.rmi.RemoteException - if a remoteexception occurs
Exception - if an unknow exception occurs
SQLException - if there is a SQL failure in the service

                                             throws org.apache.axis2.AxisFault,
                                                    java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                    Exception,
                                                    Exception,
                                                    SQLException
This method will search for articles.

Parameters:
searchFor - The string that should be searched for ( searching in title and content!)
host - the serveraddress
port - the serverport
Returns:
a list of article if any found, else null
Throws:
org.apache.axis2.AxisFault - if an axisfault occurs
java.rmi.RemoteException - if a remoteexception occurs
Exception - if an unknow exception occurs
SQLException - if there is a SQL failure in the service
